I’m a MSc student at I4Soft, Universidade Federal de Goiás, Brazil. My advisor is Celso Camilo-Junior and my research is focused in Computational Intelligence and Automated Program Repair. I hold a Computer Science bachelor from the same university where I’m doing my master’s research.
